Package xliff2n3

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration  
    Constants
    Constants
    Converter
    Performs conversions from XLIFF to N3 (using a built-in XSLT)
    Graph
    Manages the import and post-processing of XLIFF-derived triples into a Sesame triple store
    Main
    Command line entry point
    XliffLogger  
    XliffLoggerStatus
    Container for informational data about the conversion
    XliffValidator
    Validates XLIFF files against the official XLIFF schema
    XliffValidator.ValidationErrorHandler
    Handles validation errors
